title: Mic Headset, League muting mic for no reason.
body: Hey people, first post here. Would love to know if anyone else apart from me and a friend is having the problem of loading into league only to have it like somehow forcefully mute your mic? Like no changeable settings will fix it unless I unplug and re plug it in, which makes the game crash half the time and from then on I lag at the most random bs times. Is this a normal thing or am I just to fucking high? Please... just an explanation, a solution would make me just cream.

replies.body:
Have you checked your clients settings under voice?
You might have the "Mute me when I connect to league of legends voice" box checked.
Wasn't fixing it and it seems it has stopped after a few days of posting, thank thy lords.
